name: The Red Labyrinth
description:
This is my first game, ever.
I just wanted to test the Bitsy game engine  to have some fun. And ended up making a strange and not very gameplay-wise entertaining game. I was definitely entertained while doing it, though. 

There are no stakes, it is based on those labyrinths you would “solve”, in restaurants while waiting for your food to come. 

Have fun!
